title: ISO2HANDLE
description:
Are you a quality or risk manager looking for a powerful solution? With ISO2HANDLE, you get superpowers that give you ultimate control over your quality, safety, HR, and environmental processes.

Our software supports features such as risks and controls, complaint management, RI&E, registrations, notifications, task management, audits, document management, onboarding, assessments, resource management, RASCI, leave requests, assessments, certificate register, environmental measures and more.
